job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen en onderhouden van web en mobiele applicaties
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the core activities of building and maintaining software applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met product- en ontwerpteams om te zorgen voor een naadloze gebruikerservaring
job_tasks.justification: This involves collaborating with other teams to ensure the successful integration and functionality of the software from a user perspective.

job_tasks.phrase: Prioriteit geven aan verbindingen tussen de database, de betalingsdienstaanbieder, de app en het afdrukbeheersysteem
job_tasks.justification: This describes the task of integrating different software components and systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Continue integratie en testgestuurde ontwikkelingsmethoden implementeren
job_tasks.justification: This refers to implementing CI/CD and TDD methodologies, which are core to operations and deployment in software development.

job_tasks.phrase: putten uit en bijdragen aan verschillende open source projecten
job_tasks.justification: This describes involvement in the broader software development ecosystem and contribution to existing codebases.

job_tasks.phrase: AI-modellen, zoals GPT, gebruiken om de productiviteit te verhogen, de kwaliteit van de code te verbeteren, repetitieve taken te automatiseren en het ontwikkelingsproces te stroomlijnen.
job_tasks.justification: This directly mentions the use of AI models (GPT) to improve development processes, implying interaction with or utilization of generative AI capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: AI-modellen, zoals GPT, gebruiken ... om het ontwikkelingsproces te stroomlijnen.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the use of AI models to optimize development workflows.
This is a direct mention of generative AI, a key technology for the GenAI Engineer profile.

soft_skills.phrase: Problemen oplossen en complexe problemen oplossen
Blijf op de hoogte van de nieuwste ontwikkelingen

classification.rationale: The role emphasizes the use of AI models like GPT to enhance productivity and streamline the development process, which is a core aspect of a GenAI Engineer. While it involves significant software development tasks, the specific mention of 'generatieve AI' and its application points towards this specialization.
